text: Jim Coley (February 11, 1951 â€“ October 10, 2021) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Tennessee House of Representatives for the 97th district from 2007 to 2021. Coley was born in Houston, Texas. Coley died on October 10, 2021 from dementia-related problems at the age of 70.Jim Coley, Longtime State Representative, Dies ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Houston Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
